merchant_name.description: Needed by merchants/PSPs to change the charge description. Any chars above 25 are truncated. If the merchant name is less than 25 chars, it is right padded with whitespace before sent to the schemes

merchant_city.description: Contains the city of the merchant for card-present merchants and the merchant phone number for CNP merchants. Formatting rules applied as mentioned above

sub_merchant_id.description: Sub-merchant ID assigned by the Payment Facilitator.

merchant_country.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant country.

merchant_state.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant subdivision code.

merchant_zip_code.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant zip/postal code.

merchant_address.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant address.

merchant_url.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant URL

merchant_phone.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant phone number.

merchant_service_city.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant service city.

merchant_service_country.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant service country.

merchant_service_state.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant service subdivision code.

merchant_service_zip_code.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant service zip/postal code.

merchant_service_phone.description: Allows to dynamically override the merchant service phone number.
